segments.text: I'm looking for a necklace for my girl friend as a birthday present .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You've come to the right store . We've got a beautiful and wide selection of necklaces for you to choose from .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I like that one over there . Can you show it to me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you mean the exquisite golden necklace ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Exactly . How much do you want for it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It costs only two thousand yuan .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is it made of pure gold ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , it is , and the lustre will never fade out .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'll take it . Please wrap it up for me and give me the receipt .
segments.speaker: S1
